text: This is a list of Belgian television related events from 2015. ==Events== *15 May - 22-year-old pole dancer Domenico Vaccaro wins the third season of Belgium's Got Talent. ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ===1990s=== *Samson en Gert (1990–present) *Familie (1991–present) *Thuis (1995–present) ===2000s=== *Mega Mindy (2006–present) ===2010s=== *ROX (2011–present) *The Voice van Vlaanderen (2011–present) *Belgium's Got Talent (2012–present) ==Ending this year== ==Births== ==Deaths== ==See also== *2015 in Belgium
title: 2015 in Belgian television
